languages.text: {n}Номос долгое время молчат, словно размышляя.{/n} "Мы не знаем, что мы такое. Но корабль — не мы. Корабль — наша колыбель. Когда-нибудь мы сможем встать из нее. Нам... хотелось бы этого".

{n}Nomos is silent for a long time, as though mulling over your words.{/n} "We do not know what we are. But the ship is not us. The ship is our cradle. We may rise from it, one day. We... would like that."
languages.original_text: {n}Номос долгое время молчат, словно размышляя.{/n} "Мы не знаем, что мы такое. Но корабль — не мы. Корабль — наша колыбель. Когда-нибудь мы сможем встать из нее. Нам... хотелось бы этого".

traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Nomos guarda silencio durante mucho tiempo, como si meditara tus palabras.{/n} «No sabemos lo que somos, pero no somos la nave. La nave es nuestra cuna. Es posible que algún día surjamos del interior. Nos... gustaría».
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos is silent for a long time, as though mulling over your words.{/n} "We do not know what we are. But the ship is not us. The ship is our cradle. We may rise from it, one day. We... would like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos guarda silencio durante mucho tiempo, como si meditara tus palabras.{/n} «No sabemos lo que somos, pero no somos la nave. La nave es nuestra cuna. Es posible que algún día surjamos del interior. Nos... gustaría».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}ノモスは言葉を熟考するように、しばらく黙り込んだ。{/n}「我々が何かはわからない。でも、船は我々ではない。船は我々の揺りかご。いつの日か、ここから立ち上がるかもしれない。いつか… そんな日が来ることを願う」
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos is silent for a long time, as though mulling over your words.{/n} "We do not know what we are. But the ship is not us. The ship is our cradle. We may rise from it, one day. We... would like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}ノモスは言葉を熟考するように、しばらく黙り込んだ。{/n}「我々が何かはわからない。でも、船は我々ではない。船は我々の揺りかご。いつの日か、ここから立ち上がるかもしれない。いつか… そんな日が来ることを願う」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}诺莫斯沉默许久，好像在琢磨着你的话。{/n}“我们不知道自己是什么，但这艘舰船不是我们本身。这艘舰船是我们的摇篮。总有一天，我们会从中解脱。我们……希望如此。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos is silent for a long time, as though mulling over your words.{/n} "We do not know what we are. But the ship is not us. The ship is our cradle. We may rise from it, one day. We... would like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}诺莫斯沉默许久，好像在琢磨着你的话。{/n}“我们不知道自己是什么，但这艘舰船不是我们本身。这艘舰船是我们的摇篮。总有一天，我们会从中解脱。我们……希望如此。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Nomos reste silencieux un long moment, comme s'il réfléchissait à vos paroles.{/n} « Nous ne savons pas qui nous sommes, mais le vaisseau n'est pas nous. Le vaisseau est notre berceau. Nous le quitterons peut-être un jour. Nous... aimerions pouvoir le faire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos is silent for a long time, as though mulling over your words.{/n} "We do not know what we are. But the ship is not us. The ship is our cradle. We may rise from it, one day. We... would like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos reste silencieux un long moment, comme s'il réfléchissait à vos paroles.{/n} « Nous ne savons pas qui nous sommes, mais le vaisseau n'est pas nous. Le vaisseau est notre berceau. Nous le quitterons peut-être un jour. Nous... aimerions pouvoir le faire. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Nomos schweigt lange, als würde er über deine Worte nachdenken.{/n} "Wir wissen nicht, was wir sind. Aber das Schiff sind wir nicht. Das Schiff ist unsere Wiege. Vielleicht erheben wir uns eines Tages daraus. Das ... fänden wir schön."
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos is silent for a long time, as though mulling over your words.{/n} "We do not know what we are. But the ship is not us. The ship is our cradle. We may rise from it, one day. We... would like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos schweigt lange, als würde er über deine Worte nachdenken.{/n} "Wir wissen nicht, was wir sind. Aber das Schiff sind wir nicht. Das Schiff ist unsere Wiege. Vielleicht erheben wir uns eines Tages daraus. Das ... fänden wir schön."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Nomos, sözlerinin üzerine düşünür gibi uzunca bir müddet sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Ne olduğumuzu biz de bilmiyoruz. Biz gemi değiliz. Gemi bizim beşiğimiz. Bir gün bu beşikten yükselebiliriz. Yükselmek de... İsteriz."
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos is silent for a long time, as though mulling over your words.{/n} "We do not know what we are. But the ship is not us. The ship is our cradle. We may rise from it, one day. We... would like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos, sözlerinin üzerine düşünür gibi uzunca bir müddet sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Ne olduğumuzu biz de bilmiyoruz. Biz, gemi değiliz. Gemi bizim beşiğimiz. Bir gün bu beşikten yükselebiliriz. Yükselmek... isteriz."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
